translations: · The bleats of the sheep filled the air.
v．（羊）发出叫声：指羊发出特有的声音。
· The sheep bleats when it is hungry.

sentences.sentence: Every time the sheep bleats it loses a mouthful.
sentences.translation: 羊每叫一次，就少吃一口。

sentences.sentence: There is a saying that every time the sheep bleats, it loses a mouthful of hay.
sentences.translation: 有句古谚曾说，绵羊每叫一声，它就会掉落一口干草。
